trans-unit.source: Represents the data contained in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 所包含的資料。

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 與這個自動化對等相關聯的項目。

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 與保存 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯的自動化對等。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 的控制項型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.MenuItem" /> 列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 所呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 的類別名稱。

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項模式的值列舉。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得與 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTab" /> 的控制項模式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是支援的值則為支援控制項模式的物件，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns an object that supports the specified control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生其中一種下列情況下，這個方法會傳回支援指定的控制項模式的物件。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer>有子物件。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> does not have child objects.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer>沒有子物件。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> has its checkable property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Toggle>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer>其可以核取的屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem> that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> can be resized.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 等於<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem>與此相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer>可調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Hides all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 隱藏與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 中的所有項目。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 未啟用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is virtualized.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 已虛擬化。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> does not contain any items.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 不包含任何項目。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> is not available.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Displays all items that are in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> can be moved.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定是否可以移動與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 所有情況下都是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指定是否可以調整此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> (與<see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 相關聯) 的大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> can be resized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果與這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonMenuItem" /> 相關聯的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonMenuItemDataAutomationPeer" /> 可調整大小則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。
